body_html:
Ah, sorry. It was my silly mistake for making a tuple.

As the tupled_inputs is created but is not used for the input for func, I didn't think inputs is expected to be a tuple.

Thank you for the clarification and improving the interface.
body_text:
Ah, sorry. It was my silly mistake for making a tuple.
As the tupled_inputs is created but is not used for the input for func, I didn't think inputs is expected to be a tuple.
Thank you for the clarification and improving the interface.
body:
Ah, sorry. It was my silly mistake for making a tuple.

As the [`tupled_inputs`](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/autograd/gradcheck.py#L161) is created but is not used for the input for `func`, I didn't think `inputs` is expected to be a tuple.

Thank you for the clarification and improving the interface.
